tha-ap425:11.1: Na me deyyadhammo atthi → na me deyyaṃ tava atthi (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed) | na me deyyaṃ tavam atthi (pts-vp-pli1ed)
tha-ap425:13.1: Vissattho → vissaṭṭho (sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1ed, mr) | visaṭṭho (csp1ed)
tha-ap425:13.4: paripūrissatināgate → paripūrissatanāgate (bj) | paripūressatāsanaṃ (sya1ed, sya2ed) | paripūressati'nāgate (pts-vp-pli1ed) | paripūrissatāsanaṃ (mr)
